versos: (menahem) 2 Kings 15:14 - "menahem the son of Gadi went up from Tirzah and came to Samaria, and struck Shallum the son of Jabesh in Samaria, and killed him and became king in his place.";;;
(pekah) 2 Kings 15:25 - "But pekah son of Remaliah, a captain of his, conspired against him.";;;
(remaliah) Isaiah 7:1 - When Ahaz son of Jotham
(rezin) Isaiah 7:1- The Northern Kingdom-Israel and Aram Syria-Aram joins forces with Israel. King Ahaz prays for Judah's deliverance.;;;
(ahaz) Isaiah 7:10 - Again the Lord spoke to ahaz
(urijah) 2 Kings 16:10 - When King Ahaz went to meet King Tiglath-pileser of Assyria in Damascus

(pavement) 2 Chronicles 7:3 - "When all the Israelites saw the fire coming down and the glory of the Lord above the temple, they knelt on the pavement with their faces to the ground, and they worshiped and gave thanks to the Lord, saying, 'He is good; his love endures forever.'";;;
(hezekiah) 2 Chronicles 29:1 - hezekiah was twenty-five years old when he began to reign
(arba) Joshua 14:15 - "The name of Hebron formerly was Kiriath-arba. arba was the greatest man among the Anakim. And the land had rest from war.";;;
(vanity) Ecclesiastes 1:2 - "vanity of vanities, saith the Preacher, vanity of vanities; all is vanity.";;;
(teraphim) 1 Samuel 19:13 - So Michal let David down through a window
(rab) Matthew 23:6 - "They love the place of honor at banquets and the chief seats in the synagogues,";;;
(shakeh) Isaiah 41:14 - "Do not be afraid, you worm Jacob, little Israel, do not fear, for I myself will help you," declares the Lord, your Redeemer, the Holy One of Israel.;;;
(eliakim) Isaiah 22:20 - "In that day I will summon my servant, eliakim son of Hilkiah.";;;
(hilkiah) 2 Kings 22:4 - "Go up to hilkiah the high priest that he may count the money brought in to the house of the LORD which the doorkeepers have gathered from the people.";;;
(shebna) Isaiah 22:15 "Thus says the Lord God of hosts, 'Come, go to this steward, to shebna, who is in charge of the royal household,'";;;
